text:
="preserve">Menelaos Chatzigeorgiou (30 November 1924 – 12 October 2020) was a Greek politician and athlete. He was a member of the European People's Party. He was born in Thessaloniki, Greece. Between 1990 to 1994, he was a member of the European Parliament. As an athlete, he played for the Aris Thessaloniki.
Chadzigeorgiou died on 12 October 2020 in Athens at the age of 95.
